item.title: Will the Sky Fall in on UK from Brexit Vote Results?
item.description:
Will the Sky Fall in on UK from Brexit Vote Results?

The people of the United Kingdom have historically voted to leave the European Union making it the first state in the block to do so. I believe the vote to leave was more about getting out from under the dictatorship of the unelected bureaucrats in Brussels who are lording their laws across the continent with little regard for its citizens than a separation from the countries of Europe themselves.

item.title: BTCC's Bobby Lee: Chinese Capital Controls Not a Factor in Recent Bitcoin Price Rise
item.description:
BTCC's Bobby Lee: Chinese Capital Controls Not a Factor in Recent Bitcoin Price Rise

As the price of Bitcoin continues its wild ride, expert observers weigh in on the reasons: China, halving, Japan, Brexit â€’ all seen as factors. But every analysis includes the current situation in China where an uncertain economy and yuan devaluation seems to be causing a marked increase in Bitcoin trading volume.

item.title: Weekly Digest: Brexit Wins, Bitcoin Goes Up, and DAO Hacker Makes First Contact - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Weekly Digest: Brexit Wins, Bitcoin Goes Up, and DAO Hacker Makes First Contact - NEWSBTC

This week was packed with geopolitical and geoeconomic shocks all around the world. Brexit, the Colombian Government dialogue with FARC (Communist Guerrilla), and the Venezuelan OAS (Organization of American States) discussion sent ripples across the world's stock and forex markets. Bitcoin suffered from volatility increase, sending the price into a rollercoaster.

item.title: Bitcoin Price And Brexit
item.description:
Bitcoin Price And Brexit

The bitcoin price chart advanced $140 since yesterday's low. In the meantime markets rudely awoke to find Brexit had come true. Chaos ensued, but the bitcoin market keeps ticking like clockwork. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here. Not a member?

item.title: Consumers Have No Access To Pound Sterling Due To Foreign Exchange Shortage
item.description:
Consumers Have No Access To Pound Sterling Due To Foreign Exchange Shortage

One of the more worrisome side effects of the Brexit is how consumers are struggling to buy Pounds Sterling. After the price had dropped to its lowest point over 30 years, a lot of people started buying up Pounds en masse. Foreign currency providers are feeling the effects, as they have no stock to meet customer demand.

item.title: Ardor - New Competitor to Ethereum Arises Amidst Reports of The DAO Attack
item.description:
Ardor - New Competitor to Ethereum Arises Amidst Reports of The DAO Attack

Ardor, a "child chain" platform developed by the Nxt core dev team, is announced. The news comes amidst reports of The DAO hack. The event, which led to up 50 million Ether being lost to attackers, has had a very negative impact on Ethereum - the most popular Blockchain-as-a-Service platform so far.

item.title: Selfrando Technique Makes Tor Nearly Invulnerable To De-anonymization Attacks
item.description:
Selfrando Technique Makes Tor Nearly Invulnerable To De-anonymization Attacks

For quite some time now, there have been concerns over how the FBI managed to unmask Tor users. Given the nature of this anonymity software, it should not be possible for law enforcement to reveal somebody's real IP address. Selfrando, a new technique developed by academics and researchers, should prevent this from happening in the future.

item.title: Can the blockchain make electronic voting more secure?
item.description:
Can the blockchain make electronic voting more secure?

Answer: I imagine it could. That is one of the possible applications repeatedly proposed for the future by many of the Blockchain experts whose articles I've read. Even now you can embed 40 bytes of info on to a single bitcoin transaction. I imagine that would be enough for a single voter to use ...

item.title: Should I heat my home with Bitcoin miners?
item.description:
Should I heat my home with Bitcoin miners?
